sections.heading: Certificate, permit, tariff, rule, or regulation; interpretation; jurisdiction
sections.text: Except as otherwise provided in the Administrative Procedure Act, the commission shall have original exclusive jurisdiction to determine the validity of a rule or regulation and the scope or meaning of a certificate, perm

sections.heading: authorizes appellate courts to review an order of the Public Service Commission interpreting a rule or regulation pursuant to the commission's authority under this section
sections.text: In re Proposed Amend. to Title 291, 264 Neb. 298, 646 N.W.2d 650 (2002).
